post.body: How about the 29th? Let me know if that will work and then we can coordinate from there
I don't have a blog, should I?
winter will be rough for many, hope that they can come to Hawaii to avoid the cold and warm up to our islands
unreal support people, Thank You!
thank you Erica we need everyones help in spreading Hawaii message, we have a real opportunity in the first quarter, special air
interesting, thank you for the insight, great know that the interest in Hawaii is picking up!
I need to improve on my efforts here first, what happen to all my lessons?
how do we get the word out so that more people can take advantage of the special offers, and the Hawaii experience
Thanks, I will try it now!
Let me know when you have time to meet, if at all, I would like you to enjoy your visit to the islands
what's your read on travel to Hawaii, airlines are offering attractive fares through the first quarter
HOw do I get to it?
great, let everyone know that there are some attractive airfare offers out there if you want to get away from the cold
are we going to see you here?
Thank you Aqua Hotels for leading the way on attractive pricing for Hawaii experiences
So Much More Hawaii: http://tinyurl.com/5d5jgt
we also need to be letting people know about 50th Anniversary: http://www.hawaii.gov/statehoood
This is the type of the connectivity that the experience in Hawaii can give http://bit.ly/TheT
you can e-mail me at duchiyama@hawaiitourismauthority.org
I guess I am a geek want to be, I will keep trying
yes, I know you are networked their, we need to tap into those resources
I know, I am afraid of what you will make me try next. How do you figure out the reach of twitter? Can it be mapped out?
we need to get direct service, seaonal chaters to start and then maybe the carriers will feel more comfortable with schedule
agreed, we need a tweeditation to all of our friend on the mainland to come and visit, network our message, call an airline, book now
My teacher who left me with no twitter lessons, let's have a conversation about another tech venture for me?
, you making me think though! Thanks!
looking for all the input and then will make a decision, not sure that I have the time to manage a blog?
Airlines are offering special fares to Hawaii, check with your carrier and extend your Christmas shopping to a trip to Hawaii
I know this is late but if you havent already gotten you tickets go to www.sheratonhawaiibowl.com Warriors in Prime time, Destination Hawaii
Sun,Surf and the Fighting Irish, now that is a vacation package that no one else can put togther.Be perpared, don't sell our Warriors short!
"At Home in the Islands" was a popular song by the Cazimero's but it speaks true to all those that connect with the islands
Who are you cheering for Notre Dame or Hawaii, all eyes will be on sunny Hawaii tomorrow, Go Warriors!
